title: 4J Studios:正在修复PlayStation3版中的BUG
author: a20001017
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2014-7-21 21:32 编辑 

Ghenjio:Not to be rude, but haven't heard anything about the PS3 version in awhile. What's going on?
4JStudios:@Ghenjio We're bug fixing... still lots to do.
Onks27:so it will be out around mid december



Ghenjio: 别太鲁莽了，最近还没听到PS3的消息。接下来会发生什么呢？
4J Studios: 我们在修复BUG... 还有一大堆东西要做。
Onks27: 所以他在12月中期会发布






PS：别信最后一个人说的话
